meanings.definition: A dress that resembles a shirt in style and length.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable shirtdress to the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The shirtdress she bought had blue stripes.
meanings.sent3: The shirtdress looked like a long shirt, it was funny!
meanings.sent4: Her shirtdress was a blend of elegance and casual charm.
meanings.sent5: The shirtdress flowed gently in the breeze, like a shirt turned into a dress.

meanings.sent1: She decided to shirtdress for the party.
meanings.sent2: I will shirtdress for the event tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally shirtdressed for a formal occasion, causing laughter.
meanings.sent4: She shirtdressed confidently, embracing the unique style.
meanings.sent5: Shirtdressing made her feel both comfortable and stylish at the same time.
